greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle with a(n,1)=n and a(n,k)=a(n-1,k)*a(n-1,k-1).
xref: Columns include A000027, A002378, A047928, A064321. Right-hand side is A064320. Cf. A053218 which uses addition rather than multiplication to produce binomial transform.
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Sep 10 2001
